attributes.action: Release the post-mortem & medical records of Dr David Kelly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a draconian – and highly unusual – order, Lord Hutton, the peer who chaired the controversial inquiry into the Dr Kelly scandal, has secretly barred the release of all medical records, including the results of the post mortem, and unpublished evidence for 70 years.

Hiding these details for 70 years means no one can be held accountable if foul play is involved. 

We the British public demand that these details be released immediately so that we can evidence if foul play was involved, and if so, bring the relevant parties to trial.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
